name: Landowner-Developer Joint Venture Agreement
description: Agreement between customary landowners (Chiefs/Families) and developers for property development projects under the Land Act, 2020 (Act 1036).

clauses.clause_text: THIS JOINT VENTURE AGREEMENT is made on {{agreement_date}} BETWEEN {{landowner_entity}} (represented by {{head_of_family_chief}}, the 'Landowner') AND {{developer_company}} (the 'Developer').
The Landowner is the allodial owner of the land described as {{property_description}}. The Developer possesses the expertise and financial resources to develop the land into {{project_type}}.

In accordance with Act 1036, the Landowner warrants that the development has been approved by the {{stool_skin_family_council}} and that the site plan has been duly certified by the Regional Lands Commission.
The Landowner contributes the use of the Land for a period of {{jv_term_years}} years for the purpose of the Project.
The Developer shall be responsible for all costs related to planning, survey, construction, and marketing of the {{project_name}}.

The parties agree to the following revenue or unit sharing ratio: Landowner: {{landowner_share_percent}}%; Developer: {{developer_share_percent}}%. This shall be distributed as {{distribution_method}}.
Any disputes shall first be referred to customary arbitration or mediation. If unresolved within 30 days, the matter shall be referred to the High Court (Land Division) of Ghana.
